members.member:
Base class to hold all Pay calculation functions Default class behaviour is tax calculated with tax threshold applied
Data fields expected - EmployeeId, Full Name, Hours Worked, Hourly Rate, Tax Threshold, Gross Pay, Tax, Net Pay, Superannuation
